title: WCAS POLI_SCI 410-0-20 American Political Institutions and Behavior

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course provides an introduction to the evolution and current state of the academic literature on American Politics, although there is a clear focus on classic historic readings. Moreover, the course emphasizes breadth over depth (although time constraints prevent us from examining all areas of American politics). The first part of the course focuses on political behavior, while the second part emphasizes political institutions.
